#| label: tbl-vars
#| cache: true
#| cache.comments: false
#| tbl-cap: "Variable definitions and data sources"
#| tbl-pos: "H"

vars <- bind_rows(
  tibble(var = setdiff(tabvars, c("sos_com_htx", "sos_com_lvad"))),
  outvars %>%
    filter(!composite & !rep) %>%
    select(var, name),
) %>%
  mutate(
    order = 1:n(),
    # if recoding or categorizing will still get org label
    var_tmp = str_replace_all(var, "(_cat2|_cat)", ""),
    var_tmp = str_replace_all(var_tmp, "shf_sos_com_", "sos_com_")
  ) %>%
  group_by(var_tmp) %>%
  slice(1) %>%
  ungroup()

vars <- left_join(vars,
  metavars %>%
    select(variable, label, unit),
  by = c("var_tmp" = "variable")
)

# meta data
meta <- bind_rows(
  outcommeta,
  deathmeta
)
vars <- left_join(vars, meta, by = c("var_tmp" = "Variable"))

ihdspec <- str_split(str_trim(meta %>% filter(Variable %in% c("sos_com_pci", "sos_com_cabg", "sos_com_ihd")) %>% pull(Code)), " ", simplify = T)
ihdspec <- c(ihdspec[, 1], ihdspec[, 2])
ihdspec <- paste0(
  paste0("ICD:", str_remove_all(paste0(ihdspec[str_detect(ihdspec, "ICD")], collapse = ","), "ICD:")),
  " ",
  paste0("OP:", str_remove_all(paste0(ihdspec[str_detect(ihdspec, "OP")], collapse = ","), "OP:"))
)

vars <- vars %>%
  mutate(
    label = coalesce(name, label),
    Variable = coalesce(label, var_tmp),
    # small fixes
    Variable = str_replace_all(Variable, fixed("Disposable income (100 SEK)"), "Income"), ,
    Code = case_when(
      Variable == "Non-CV death" ~ "ICD All exept I, J81, K761, R570, G45",
      Variable == "Previous HFH <= 6 months" ~ paste0("ICD ", str_replace_all(global_hficd, "\\|", ",")),
      TRUE ~ Code
    )
  )

vars <- vars %>%
  arrange(order) %>%
  mutate(
    order = 1:n(),
    Code = str_trim(Code),
    Code = if_else(Variable == "Ischemic heart disease", ihdspec, Code),
    Code = str_replace_all(Code, "ICD", "ICD-10"),
    Code = case_when(
      is.na(Register) ~ Code,
      Period == "0-" ~ str_replace_all(Code, "ICD-10", "ICD-9/10"),
      TRUE ~ Code
    ),
    Code = str_replace_all(Code, ":", " "),
    Code = str_replace_all(Code, ",", ", "),
    Code = str_replace_all(Code, "OP ", "Procedure "),
    Code = str_replace_all(Code, "Ekod ", "Cause "),
  )

# data sources and footnotes
vars <- vars %>%
  mutate(
    data1 = if_else(str_detect(var, "^shf_"), "SwedeHF", NA),
    data2 = case_when(
      str_detect(var, "sos_com_|sos_prevhfh6mo") & !is.na(Code) ~ paste0("NPR: ", Code),
      str_detect(var, "sos_com_") ~ "NPR",
      str_detect(var, "sos_out_") & !str_detect(var, "death") & !is.na(Code) ~ paste0("NPR: ", Code)
    ),
    data3 = if_else(str_detect(var, "scb_famtype|scb_education|scb_dispincome"), "LISA", NA),
    data4 = if_else(str_detect(var, "scb_child"), "RTP", NA),
    data6 = case_when(
      str_detect(var, "death") & !is.na(Code) ~ paste0("NCDR: ", Code),
      str_detect(var, "death") & is.na(Code) ~ "NCDR"
    ),
    footnote1 = if_else(str_detect(var, "sos_com") & !Variable %in% c("Charlson Comorbidity Index"), footnote_marker_alphabet(1, format = "latex"), ""),
    footnote2 = if_else(str_detect(var, "scb_"), footnote_marker_alphabet(2, format = "latex"), ""),
    footnote3 = if_else(str_detect(var, "sos_out") & !str_detect(var, "death"), footnote_marker_alphabet(3, format = "latex"), ""),
    footnote4 = if_else(str_detect(var, "death"), footnote_marker_alphabet(4, format = "latex"), ""),
    footnote5 = if_else(Variable == "Charlson Comorbidity Index", footnote_marker_alphabet(5, format = "latex"), "")
  ) %>%
  unite(datasource, starts_with("data"), sep = "; ", na.rm = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(
    datasource = case_when(
      Variable == "eGFR" ~ "SwedeHF CKD-EPI 2021 (see reference)",
      Variable == "Anemia" ~ "SwedeHF Female Hb < 120 g/L/Male Hb < 130 g/L",
      TRUE ~ datasource
    )
  ) %>%
  unite(footnote, starts_with("footnote"), sep = "") %>%
  arrange(order) %>%
  mutate(datasource = paste0(datasource, footnote)) %>%
  select(Variable, datasource)

footnotetext <- c(
  "Derived from diagnoses/operations in all positions, in-patient and out-patient speciality care within 5 years prior to index (ICD-10)/1987 (ICD-9) unless stated otherwise.",
  "From the year preceeding baseline.",
  "Derived from operations in all positions, in-patient and out-patient speciality.",
  "Cause of death is derived from the underlying cause of death.",
  "Derived from diagnoses in all positions, in-patient and out-patient speciality care within 10 years prior to index using ICD-9/10 according to Ludvigsson, 2021 (see reference)."
)

vars_xls <- vars %>%
  mutate(
    datasource = str_remove_all(datasource, "textsuperscript|\\}|\\{"),
    datasource = str_replace_all(datasource, "\\\\", " ")
  ) %>%
  select(Variable, datasource) %>%
  add_row(Variable = "") %>%
  add_row(Variable = paste0("a ", footnotetext[1])) %>%
  add_row(Variable = paste0("b ", footnotetext[2])) %>%
  add_row(Variable = paste0("c ", footnotetext[3])) %>%
  add_row(Variable = paste0("d ", footnotetext[4])) %>%
  add_row(Variable = paste0("e ", footnotetext[5]))

if (output) {
  make_one_xlsxsheet(vars_xls,
    colnames = c("Variable", "Data source")
  )
}


vars <- vars %>%
  mutate(
    # so no probs
    Variable = sanitize_text(Variable)
  )


default_kable(vars,
  escape = FALSE,
  longtable = TRUE,
  font_size = 9,
  col.names = c("Variable", "Data source")
) %>%
  footnote(
    footnote_order = c("general", "symbol", "alphabet"),
    general_title = "",
    general = c(
      "Abbreviations: SwedeHF, The Swedish Heart Failure Registry; NPR, The National Patient Register; LISA, Longitudinal integrated database for health insurance and labour market studies; RTP, Register of the Total Population; NCDR, The National Cause of Death Register"
    ),
    alphabet = footnotetext,
    threeparttable = T
  ) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "6cm") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "8cm")
